original_text: The priest will take some of the blood of this sin offering and he will put it on the posts of the temple doors. He must also put some of the blood on the four corners on the top of the altar. He must also put some blood on the gate posts at the entrance to the inside yard of the temple.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 속죄제 희생제물의 피를 가져다가 성전 문설주와 제단 아래층 네 모퉁이와 안뜰 문설주에 바를 것이요

sentences.original_text: The priest will take some of the blood
on the posts of the temple doors
He must also put some of the blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 그 피의 일부를 바라야 할 것인데

sentences.original_text: on the top of the altar
He must also put some blood
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 또한 피를 바라야 할 것인데

sentences.original_text: at the entrance to the inside yard
